name: Shrew in the Garden
description:
You are a shrew. Collect potatoes to feed your family, but it doesn't count until you bring them back to the nest. You can eat worms but snakes eat you!

Arrows keys or WASD to move. Space bar to jump. You need to jump out of your hole to go above ground.

This is my entry in TriJam 175. Built with about 6 hours of work.  The theme was "Bring back potatoes". Made using microstudio.dev with Quick library. I made the code and sprites myself.

CREDITS

  • Music: “Chubby Cat”, from PlayOnLoop.com Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0
  • Sound effects from Groovy's Retro Sound Effects by GroovyMaster
  • Heart sprite adapted from Simple Dungeon Crawler by 0-lobster CC0
  • Snake sprite adapted from Deep Night by Vexed CC0

Bug FIxes

 27JUN2022 at 10:50PM Eastern - bug fix for correct scoring when moving to next level, and sometime potatoes were not picked up

28JUN2022 at 7:30PM Eastern - bug fix that levels were not progressing properly. Fix audio not restarting when game restarted.
